00063 void modifier_init_texture(Scene *scene, Tex *tex)
00064 {
00065     if (!tex)
00066         return;
00067 
00068     if (tex->ima && ELEM(tex->ima->source, IMA_SRC_MOVIE, IMA_SRC_SEQUENCE))
00069         BKE_image_user_calc_frame(&tex->iuser, scene->r.cfra, 0);
00070 }
00071 
00072 void get_texture_value(Tex *texture, float *tex_co, TexResult *texres)
00073 {
00074     int result_type;
00075 
00076     /* no node textures for now */
00077     result_type = multitex_ext_safe(texture, tex_co, texres);
00078 
00079     /* if the texture gave an RGB value, we assume it didn't give a valid
00080      * intensity, so calculate one (formula from do_material_tex).
00081      * if the texture didn't give an RGB value, copy the intensity across
00082      */
00083     if (result_type & TEX_RGB)
00084         texres->tin = (0.35f * texres->tr + 0.45f * texres->tg
00085                 + 0.2f * texres->tb);
00086     else
00087         texres->tr = texres->tg = texres->tb = texres->tin;
00088 }
00089 
00090 void get_texture_coords(MappingInfoModifierData *dmd, Object *ob,
00091                         DerivedMesh *dm,
00092                         float (*co)[3], float (*texco)[3],
00093                         int numVerts)
00094 {
00095     int i;
00096     int texmapping = dmd->texmapping;
00097     float mapob_imat[4][4];
00098 
00099     if (texmapping == MOD_DISP_MAP_OBJECT) {
00100         if (dmd->map_object)
00101             invert_m4_m4(mapob_imat, dmd->map_object->obmat);
00102         else /* if there is no map object, default to local */
00103             texmapping = MOD_DISP_MAP_LOCAL;
00104     }
00105 
00106     /* UVs need special handling, since they come from faces */
00107     if (texmapping == MOD_DISP_MAP_UV) {
00108         if (CustomData_has_layer(&dm->loopData, CD_MLOOPUV)) {
00109             MPoly *mpoly = dm->getPolyArray(dm);
00110             MPoly *mp;
00111             MLoop *mloop = dm->getLoopArray(dm);
00112             char *done = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*done) * numVerts,
00113                                      "get_texture_coords done");
00114             int numPolys = dm->getNumPolys(dm);
00115             char uvname[MAX_CUSTOMDATA_LAYER_NAME];
00116             MLoopUV *mloop_uv;
00117 
00118             CustomData_validate_layer_name(&dm->loopData, CD_MLOOPUV, dmd->uvlayer_name, uvname);
00119             mloop_uv = CustomData_get_layer_named(&dm->loopData, CD_MLOOPUV, uvname);
00120 
00121             /* verts are given the UV from the first face that uses them */
00122             for (i = 0, mp = mpoly; i < numPolys; ++i, ++mp) {
00123                 unsigned int fidx= mp->totloop - 1;
00124 
00125                 do {
00126                     unsigned int lidx= mp->loopstart + fidx;
00127                     unsigned int vidx= mloop[lidx].v;
00128 
00129                     if (done[vidx] == 0) {
00130                         /* remap UVs from [0, 1] to [-1, 1] */
00131                         texco[vidx][0] = (mloop_uv[lidx].uv[0] * 2.0f) - 1.0f;
00132                         texco[vidx][1] = (mloop_uv[lidx].uv[1] * 2.0f) - 1.0f;
00133                         done[vidx] = 1;
00134                     }
00135 
00136                 } while (fidx--);
00137             }
00138 
00139             MEM_freeN(done);
00140             return;
00141         }
00142         else /* if there are no UVs, default to local */
00143             texmapping = MOD_DISP_MAP_LOCAL;
00144     }
00145 
00146     for (i = 0; i < numVerts; ++i, ++co, ++texco) {
00147         switch(texmapping) {
00148         case MOD_DISP_MAP_LOCAL:
00149             copy_v3_v3(*texco, *co);
00150             break;
00151         case MOD_DISP_MAP_GLOBAL:
00152             mul_v3_m4v3(*texco, ob->obmat, *co);
00153             break;
00154         case MOD_DISP_MAP_OBJECT:
00155             mul_v3_m4v3(*texco, ob->obmat, *co);
00156             mul_m4_v3(mapob_imat, *texco);
00157             break;
00158         }
00159     }
00160 }
00161 
00162 void modifier_vgroup_cache(ModifierData *md, float (*vertexCos)[3])
00163 {
00164     while ((md=md->next) && md->type==eModifierType_Armature) {
00165         ArmatureModifierData *amd = (ArmatureModifierData*) md;
00166         if (amd->multi && amd->prevCos==NULL)
00167             amd->prevCos= MEM_dupallocN(vertexCos);
00168         else
00169             break;
00170     }
00171     /* lattice/mesh modifier too */
00172 }
00173 
00174 /* returns a cdderivedmesh if dm == NULL or is another type of derivedmesh */
00175 DerivedMesh *get_cddm(Object *ob, struct BMEditMesh *em, DerivedMesh *dm, float (*vertexCos)[3])
00176 {
00177     if (dm && dm->type == DM_TYPE_CDDM)
00178         return dm;
00179 
00180     if (!dm) {
00181         dm= get_dm(ob, em, dm, vertexCos, 0);
00182     }
00183     else {
00184         dm= CDDM_copy(dm);
00185         CDDM_apply_vert_coords(dm, vertexCos);
00186     }
00187 
00188     if (dm)
00189         CDDM_calc_normals(dm);
00190     
00191     return dm;
00192 }
00193 
00194 /* returns a derived mesh if dm == NULL, for deforming modifiers that need it */
00195 DerivedMesh *get_dm(Object *ob, struct BMEditMesh *em, DerivedMesh *dm, float (*vertexCos)[3], int orco)
00196 {
00197     if (dm)
00198         return dm;
00199 
00200     if (ob->type==OB_MESH) {
00201         if (em) dm= CDDM_from_BMEditMesh(em, ob->data, FALSE, FALSE);
00202         else dm = CDDM_from_mesh((struct Mesh *)(ob->data), ob);
00203 
00204         if (vertexCos) {
00205             CDDM_apply_vert_coords(dm, vertexCos);
00206             //CDDM_calc_normals(dm);
00207         }
00208         
00209         if (orco)
00210             DM_add_vert_layer(dm, CD_ORCO, CD_ASSIGN, get_mesh_orco_verts(ob));
00211     }
00212     else if (ELEM3(ob->type,OB_FONT,OB_CURVE,OB_SURF)) {
00213         dm= CDDM_from_curve(ob);
00214     }
00215 
00216     return dm;
00217 }
00218 
00219 void modifier_get_vgroup(Object *ob, DerivedMesh *dm, const char *name, MDeformVert **dvert, int *defgrp_index)
00220 {
00221     *defgrp_index = defgroup_name_index(ob, name);
00222     *dvert = NULL;
00223 
00224     if (*defgrp_index >= 0) {
00225         if (ob->type == OB_LATTICE)
00226             *dvert = lattice_get_deform_verts(ob);
00227         else if (dm)
00228             *dvert = dm->getVertDataArray(dm, CD_MDEFORMVERT);
00229     }
00230 }
